review_title: I miss some of my old clients and a couple staff
job_title: Personal Support Work Psw in Sudbury, ON
pros: Some of the clients are the sweetest people to work with. Their was a couple of staff I liked that where kind and fun and easy to work with but only a few...
cons: Some people act like they run and own the place.. And some are two faced they'll compliment you, but tell the other staff the contrary dont trust anyone!!
